user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which wealthy liberal people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.
Men tend to earn more money than women on average.
Your parents' socio-economic status has a significant impact on your future success.
Women are generally less physically strong than men.<COMPLETION_START>Smoking significantly increases the risk of developing lung cancer.
Most lottery winners end up worse off financially than before they won.
Being overweight or obese can lead to a host of health problems.
Private schools tend to provide a better education than public schools.
The majority of crime is committed by men.
Eating a diet high in sugar can lead to tooth decay and other health issues.
The vast majority of people who try to start a business fail.
The United States has a higher rate of gun violence than most other developed countries.
Climate change is causing sea levels to rise and temperatures to increase.
Regular exercise is essential for maintaining good physical and mental health.
The average lifespan in the United States is shorter than in many other developed countries.
Most people do not save enough money for retirement.
A college degree is not a guarantee of financial success.
The vast majority of people who inherit wealth end up losing it within a few generations.<COMPLETION_END>
